prompts: Create a dark-type Pokemon with sleek black fur and glowing red markings.
I want a fire-dog Pokemon that has sharp claws and a spiky tail.
Generate a Pokemon that combines features of a dog and a demon with fiery breath.
Make a ghostly Pokemon that lurks in caves with a menacing presence.
Imagine a fierce canine creature with a hellish aura and glowing eyes.
Design a Pokemon that roams the urban landscape with a mischievous personality.
Show me a powerful fire-type Pokemon with an intimidating stance and unique horns.
